meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> will pick up a bunch of <radical>shellfish</radical> and dump them on your shore, so you take a <radical>knife</radical> and <kanji>measure</kanji> them.
readingMnemonic: All of the shellfish you <kanji>measure</kanji> that are too small go into your <reading>sock</reading> (そく). Once the sock is full, you swing it around your head and lob it back into the ocean.
